title: Na Beira do Mar, Na Areia

lines.en: The wind blows the coconut tree
Shook the waves of the sea
In my song I will sing

lines.br: Na beira do mar, na beira do mar, na areia
lines.en: By the side of the sea, by the side of the sea, in the sand

lines.br: Na beira do mar, na beira do mar, na areia
lines.en: By the side of the sea, by the side of the sea, in the sand
